findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The permitOnPresale() function has a loop that adds permitted addresses on presale and could be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list of addresses.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock, allowing them to retake ownership even after renouncing it.

findings.title: Owner can finish presale
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to finish the presale.

findings.title: Owner can add addresses that can transfer on presale
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add addresses that can transfer on presale, which could lead to unauthorized transactions.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from reward
findings.description: The owner has privileges to include or exclude addresses from rewards, which could lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has privileges to include or exclude addresses from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax, liquidity, dev and swap fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax, liquidity, development, and swap fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can enable / disable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable swap and liquify functionality.

findings.title: Owner can change dev wallet address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the development wallet address.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw ERC20 tokens from contract balance
findings.description: The owner has privileges to withdraw ERC20 tokens from the contract balance.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BNBs from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw BNBs from the contract.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Changing Spawning, Retirement, Marketplace, and Exp Manager
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to change spawning, retirement, marketplace, and exp manager, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privileges in Whitelist Management
findings.description: The owner has the ability to include and exclude addresses from spawner, byeSayer, marketplace, and expScientist whitelist, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Unrestricted Access to Critical Functions
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted access to critical functions such as spawning, rebirth, retirement, transfer, and evolvement, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: CEO can change CFO and COO addresses
findings.description: The CEO has the privilege to modify CFO and COO addresses.

findings.title: CFO can withdraw contact ETHs
findings.description: The CFO has the privilege to withdraw contract ETHs.

findings.title: CFO can withdraw contract tokens
findings.description: The CFO has the privilege to withdraw contract tokens.

findings.title: CEO, CFO and COO can pause contract
findings.description: The CEO, CFO, and COO have the privilege to pause the contract, which could lead to potential disruptions or unauthorized control.

findings.title: CEO can unpause contract
findings.description: The CEO has the privilege to unpause the contract, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: CEO, CFO and COO can change token uri
findings.description: The CEO, CFO, and COO have the privilege to modify the token URI.

findings.title: Owner can change the fee token
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee token, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Out of gas (TheRocks)
findings.description: N/A
